job.title: Fully Remote Machine Learning Software Engineer - $180k+
job.industry: Information Technology and Services,Staffing and Recruiting,Human Resources
job.description: Fully Remote AWS Machine Learning Software Engineer- $180k+<br><br>This organization is a platform-based company that uses machine learning to provide health systems with a single solution for automating revenue cycling operations.<br><br><strong><u>The Ideal Candidate Will Have<br></u></strong><ul><li> 4-5 years overall experience in Machine Learning or Data Engineering</li><li> Must have Python OR C++ development experience</li><li> Machine learning frameworks required (TensorFlow preferred)</li><li> AWS experience preferred</li><li> Natural Language Processing highly preferred<br></li></ul>This company is RAPIDLY growing and never stopped growing during the pandemic. They offer excellent benefits, a competitive salary, 401K, and unlimited PTO. They have a great career advancement structure and are looking for the best and brightest to join their excellent team.<br><br>Please apply ASAP if you are interested in learning more about this opportunity and we can set up a time to speak today! m.epstein@jeffersonfrank.com<br><br>AWS / Software Engineer / Machine Learning / Python / C++
